meta.title: Contact Us - Admissions & Enquiries
meta.description: Contact Tarakeswar School of Hotel Management & Technical Foundation for admissions, course enquiries, and campus visits. Located at College Road, Padmapukur, Tarakeswar, Hooghly 712410. Call +91 96359 64348.
